posts.title: I Don't Care If You Don't Like Peaches
posts.subtitle: Products Shouldn’t Be Built for Everyone
posts.author: Laura Gemmell
posts.excerpt: I seem to have accidentally created a brand – and a product – that is a little like Marmite. Some people hate it, others love it. And I’m finally okay with that.
